description:
Framework for Microsoft SharePoint© 2010 and 2013. Allows to map list items to simple hand-writen POCO classes and perform actions by manipulating with entities.
- strong typed operations with items
- abstract layer on Sharepoint object model
- simplifying recurring routine actions
- ability to unit test
releaseNotes:
- fixed lookup creation in SharePoint 2013
- replace SPSecurity.RunWithElevatedPrivelegies by open SPSite with SPUserToken.SystemAccount
- add WebFactory overload to open site in specified url zone
summary:
Framework for Microsoft SharePoint© 2010 and 2013. Allows to map list items to simple hand-writen POCO classes and perform actions by manipulating with entities.
GOALS:
- strong typed operations with items
- abstract layer on Sharepoint object model
- simplifying recurring routine actions
- ability to unit test
FEATURES:
- create wrappers on a SPSite,SPWeb,SPList
- create repositories for lists
- get items by typed query, Id, Guid or specified field
- create, update, delete items by typed entity
- lazy access to any entity property(Castle Proxy)
- typed CAML queries(Caml.NET with extentions)
- many other features upcoming
